hero.description: Shinerock Labs is a NYC-based software and design studio specializing in MVPs, full-scale systems, and AI automations. We partner with startups and teams to move fast, look sharp, and build right. With over 15 years of experience working with S&P 500 companies, startups, and small businesses, we bring enterprise-level expertise to projects of any size.

cta.title: Ready to get started?
cta.description: Schedule a free consultation to discuss your project and find the perfect plan for your needs.

faq.question: Can I switch plans?
faq.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes take effect at the start of your next billing cycle.

faq.question: What's included in the monthly retainer?
faq.answer: You get dedicated UX and software engineering support with priority response times. Perfect for ongoing product development and maintenance.

faq.question: Do you offer refunds?
faq.answer: For one-time projects, we work in milestones with payments tied to deliverables. Monthly retainers can be cancelled anytime with no penalties.

faq.question: What technologies do you work with?
faq.answer: We specialize in modern web technologies including React, Next.js, Node.js, Python, and cloud platforms like AWS and Vercel.

plans.name: One-Time Project
plans.description: Perfect for single projects with defined scope

cta.title: Ready to build your product?
cta.description: Let's discuss your project requirements and create a custom development plan.

faq.question: What's your development process?
faq.answer: We follow an agile methodology with 2-week sprints, regular demos, and continuous feedback loops to ensure we're building exactly what you need.

faq.question: How long does a typical project take?
faq.answer: MVPs typically take 8-12 weeks, while larger applications can take 3-6 months. We'll provide a detailed timeline during our initial consultation.

faq.question: Do you provide ongoing maintenance?
faq.answer: Yes! We offer maintenance packages starting at $1,200/month for bug fixes, updates, and feature enhancements.

faq.question: Can you work with our existing codebase?
faq.answer: Absolutely. We can audit, refactor, or extend your existing application with new features and improvements.

studies.title: Document Processing Automation
studies.description: Automated contract review and data extraction, saving 20 hours per week.
studies.results: 80% time savings, 95% accuracy, ROI in 3 months

studies.title: Workflow Integration
studies.description: Connected 5 systems to automate order processing and inventory management.
studies.results: Zero manual data entry, 50% faster fulfillment, $100K saved annually

cta.title: Ready to automate?
cta.description: Let's identify the processes that will benefit most from automation and build a custom solution.

faq.question: What processes can be automated?
faq.answer: We can automate document processing, data entry, email workflows, report generation, customer onboarding, and much more. If it's repetitive, it can likely be automated.

faq.question: How much time will automation save?
faq.answer: Most clients see 60-80% time savings on automated processes. We'll analyze your current workflow and provide specific estimates during consultation.

faq.question: Do you use AI in automations?
faq.answer: Yes! We integrate GPT-4, Claude, and custom ML models for intelligent document processing, data extraction, and decision-making workflows.

faq.question: Can you integrate with our existing tools?
faq.answer: Absolutely. We work with most popular tools via APIs including Salesforce, HubSpot, Google Workspace, Microsoft 365, and custom systems.

plans.name: Single Automation
plans.description: Automate one specific workflow or process

plans.name: Automation Suite
plans.description: Multiple connected automations for end-to-end workflows
